title: Friday Post Show (10-29-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (10-29-21)
description:
Bobby talks about traveling this weekend and wishing he would never have to travel or leave his house again. He shares stories behind the BobbyCast this week with Charles Kelly. Plus Matthew Perry is releasing an autobiography, Tom Hanks crashes a wedding, and a man’s last meal was halted. Mike D also talks about how he believes in demons. We also talk about our Halloween plans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
